body: When people are being annoying in chat mods normally give them a kick then if they continue a temp ban then a bigger temp ban and then a full ban.do you think this is good? Or do you think they should get less chances? 2 chances? One chance? More chances? Post your opinion bellow with some good backup facts.have fun in this debate don't get frustrated over it it is just for fun and to see other people's opinions!
